casebody.data:
PEREY v. NEW YORK RAPID TRANSIT CORPORATION. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 5, 1927. No. 154. Cavanagh & James, of New York City, for appellant. William E. Warland, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This is a companion cause to Perey v. Perey Manufacturing Co., 22 F.(2d) 928, decided herewith. In view of what we have said in the main case, no discussion is necessary here.

Decree reversed.
